title: New Creator: Insight on Esports
body:
Name: Insight on Esports

Socials: https://www.twitch.tv/insightonesports (43k) https://www.youtube.com/insightonesports (57k)

Info: Insight on Esports is a content channel hosted and ran by two of esports' most outspoken personalities, Christopher "MonteCristo" Mykles and Duncan "Thorin" Shields. IoE is home to several shows covering League of Legends Pro League, Overwatch League, and general podcasts covering the happenings of the esports industry. MonteCristo and Thorin plan to relaunch the channel with additional top-tier talent and regular programming for 2021 and beyond.

Use Case: Discord gated access & roles, in-stream voting and control for $GROG holders, and ongoing giveaways+competitions for their community.

Community Treasury Grant Tier: $500

A "Yes" vote would approve Insight on Esports as a creator, and provide a $500 grant.

A "No" vote would reject Insight on Esports from the platform.
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
